name: pbr-anywhere
description: PBR Anywhere - Watch PBR events on-demand after they've aired live

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../scraper && npm install && cd ../recorder && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd infrastructure && npm run deploy

author: PBR Anywhere Team
